titleStmt.title: A letter from Dublin; of April the second Giving an account of the posture of affairs there; as also of the nnmbers [sic] of the French that are landed in that kingdom, and of the Irish that are sent over to France, with several other important matters. Liverpoole, April 12. 1690. Licensed, April 16. 1690.
titleStmt.author: Johnson, Robert, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library, Cambridge.
